rules_text:
Choose two –
• Exile target creature with the greatest power among creatures on the battlefield.
• Target player looks at the top four cards of their library. They put one into their hand, then exile the rest.
• Exile up to four target cards from opponents graveyards.
• Until the end of your next turn, target player may play cards exiled by Andazir’s Command.
